Html: Does anyone know of a shared hosting company that can host this application and work? Anyone out there have this app hosted somewhere in a shared environment? I've tried at my current provider and they say that they will not setup a wildcard extension in IIS to handle the extension-less files. Can anyone out there refer someone?
Try OrcsWeb or DiscountASP (both of them are our sponsor), infact the http://dotnetshoutout.com is currently running in ORCSWeb.
I use ReliableSite hosting provider (http://reliablesite.net) to host my KIGG-project (http://parentslink.com.ua). I chose a simple shared hosting option and it works excellent

Hi, you have to check the page

"http://www.webhost4lifereview.com/kigg-mvc-web-hosting/“

Good Luck!

Helen
